TopicTitle: Mod to access career building limits

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I want to request someone smarter than me that has already learned to code make an awesome plugin to allow access of the gamevaribles for career building limits such as part count, height, weight, etc. If this could be configured via a simple text file then career mode would vastly improve mod compatibility. I am sure you would be a hero to many as this is one of the huge improvements in 1.0 that has yet to be tapped. Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
It is already being worked on. Soon
